rounds.prompt:
You will play a game with 5 rounds.
In each round you'll be shown a set of black squares distributed over 2 quadrants of a rectangle.
The available quadrants are: Quadrant 1, Quadrant 2.
Each quadrant contains 1 square with a specific letter name:
- Quadrant 1: square A
- Quadrant 2: square B
Each black square will be accessible for a finite amount of rounds until it disappears.
In each round you'll be able to choose one of the available black squares and learn its color (GREEN or RED) by selecting its letter.
Once the 5 rounds are finished, you'll be asked to choose which quadrant had the highest ratio of one color to the other.
If you guess correctly you gain 100 points, if incorrectly you lose 100 points.

Round 1: You see black squares A, B. Based on previous observations, choose one square to sample by responding with just the letter. You press <<
